H0.text: The earth is divided into the crust, mantle, and core.

H1.text: Crust, core, magma are the three parts into which the earth is divided.

H2.text: Oceans, land, and air are the three parts into which the earth is divided.

H3.text: Troposphere, atomosphere, and xerosphere are the three parts into which Earth is divided.

A4.text: The Earth's crust is the top component of the lithosphere.

A5.text: partial-melting of the underlying mantle yields basaltic magmas.
